headline: Can Sustained Product Demand Drive BDX Stock Before Q3 Earnings?
summary: BD's third-quarter fiscal 2025 results are likely to benefit from product launches across Medical and Interventional segments, which drive strong revenue potential.

headline: Instylla Appoints MedTech Leader Sean Boyle as Chief Executive Officer
summary: Instylla, Inc., a privately held clinical-stage company developing solutions for peripheral vascular embolization, has announced the appointment of Sean Boyle as Chief Executive Officer.

raw.headline: Instylla Appoints MedTech Leader Sean Boyle as Chief Executive Officer

headline: BD announces $35m investment to expand prefilled syringe manufacturing in US
summary: The syringes are said to be produced using a hands-free and fully automated process to minimise contamination risks.

raw.headline: BD announces $35m investment to expand prefilled syringe manufacturing in US
raw.summary: The syringes are said to be produced using a hands-free and fully automated process to minimise contamination risks.

headline: BD Businesses Become First in MedTech to Achieve HIRC's Diamond Badge Across All Supply Chain Resiliency Categories
summary: BD (Becton, Dickinson and Company) (NYSE: BDX), a leading global medical technology company, today announced that its Urology and Critical Care (UCC) and Surgery business units are the first in the medical technology industry to achieve a diamond-level rating for all seven supply chain resilience domains of the Healthcare Industry Resilience Collaborative's (HIRC) Resiliency Badging program.

raw.headline: BD Businesses Become First in MedTech to Achieve HIRC's Diamond Badge Across All Supply Chain Resiliency Categories
raw.summary: BD (Becton, Dickinson and Company) (NYSE: BDX), a leading global medical technology company, today announced that its Urology and Critical Care (UCC) and Surgery business units are the first in the medical technology industry to achieve a diamond-level rating for all seven supply chain resilience domains of the Healthcare Industry Resilience Collaborative's (HIRC) Resiliency Badging program.
